SEARCH
Package rayrangers.raytracer.world

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
rayrangers.raytracer.world.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hittable, Transformable
public class Entity extends Object implements Hittable, Transformable
Represents an entity (object/mesh) described by a Wavefront OBJ file.

      public boolean hit(Ray ray, double t0, double t1, HitRecord record)
      Description copied from interface: Hittable
      Checks if a ray has a hit in the specified interval [t0; t1].
      Specified by:
      hit in interface Hittable
      Parameters:
      ray - Ray to check for a hit
      t0 - Minimum ray parameter
      t1 - Maximum ray parameter
      record - Hit record
      Returns:
      Returns true if a hit occurred in the interval.
